Author: dis__cord
Text: Thank you for the encouragement!   It just slipped bc my sibling kept using it on me due to my behaviour, sorry for my insensitivity.

Author: shark_robinson
Text: I’m really sorry you’re dealing with all of that. I don’t really have advice but I hope things improve for you soon. It’s not your fault.   Also please don’t use the r word. It’s a very hateful word and using it makes this community less accessible for disabled folks who also deal with EDs. Best of luck!
